page.title: 05HOUSING IN WINGRAVE
page.content: {A new housing estate} called Twelve Leys has just been built. The first houses were finished four years ago. However a newer part of the estate has only just been finished. At present there are 65 houses on the estate but most of them are very small. Most of the houses are big enough to houses four people.The houses consist {of 3 bedrooms, a bathroom, a small kitchen and a larage living room.} They also have a small garden and a garage. The vast majority of houses are old, there also are some concil houses. The oldest house in the village was built in the {sixteenth centurey.}
